summary: A follower based on the character Morigesh from Paragon. I made 2 variations of her shawl - a white & a black one, and there are 3 variations of her mask - normal, black & bloodstained. She's carrying a spare copy of the normal mask & shawl but the other variations you have to craft yourself.
descriptionHtml:
A follower based on the character Morigesh from Paragon. I made 2 variations of her shawl - a white & a black one, and there are 3 variations of her mask - normal, black & bloodstained. She's carrying a spare copy of the normal mask & shawl but the other variations you have to craft yourself. She's located by the guardian stones near Riverwood. The shawl works for all races but the mask doesn't fit Khajiit or Argonians so they can't wear it.
She's not 100% accurate but I'm not amazing at 3d modelling or texturing so it's the best I could do. Also - the shawl was designed to work with the fur armour - which looks closest to her outfit in Paragon - and the mages robes. It might work with other armours or items of clothing but some like the thieves guild or iron armour for example you're going to get shoulder guards clipping through it etc.
Her dagger is just nettlebane, I just renamed it.
author: TurelimVampire
